repository package¶

Subpackages¶

  • repository.local package
    • Submodules
    • Module contents

Module contents¶

Collection of classes to access and index file repositories.

Provides interface definitions for classes repository.Repository and repository.File. Actual implementations are provided by sub-packages.

The following implementations, i.e. sub-packages, are currently available:
  • local: Files are stored on a local file system.

The repository.Index class provides functionality to index file meta data for the purpose of caching, filtering and sorting.

class repository.File(uuid, rep, index=None)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

File within a repository.

Abstract base class providing basic functionality common to all File subclasses.

Properties:
uuid (str): Universally unique identifier (UUID) of the file. Typically
the full path of the file within the repository.

rep (repository.Repository): Repository containing the file. name (str): Name of the file. Default is None. index (repository.Index): Optional file meta data index. Default is

None.
type (int): Type of the file. Default is None. If set the following
values may be returend: TYPE_UNKNOWN: Unknown file type TYPE_IMAGE: Image file TYPE_VIDEO: Video file

width (int): Width of the file content in pixels. Default is None. height (int): Height of the file content in pixels. Default is None. rotation (int): Clock-wise rotation of the content in degrees. Default

is None. If set the following values may be returned: 0, 90, 180 or 270.
orientation (int): Orientation of the content considering rotation.
Default is None. If set the following values may be returned: ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE: Content wider than high (default) ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT: Content heigher than wide
creation_date (DateTime): Creation date of file content. Default is
None.

description (str): Description of the file content. Default is None. rating (int): Rating of the file content. Default is None. tags (set of str): User defined tags on the file. Not to be confounded

with EXIF tags in image files. Default is None.
ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE = 0¶
ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT = 1¶
TYPE_IMAGE = 1¶
TYPE_UNKNOWN = 0¶
TYPE_VIDEO = 2¶

Return creation date of the file content.

Returns:Creation date of the file content. Note that this is not necessarily the creation date of the file.

Return orientation of the file content.

Returns:Orientation of the content considering rotation. The following values may be returned: ORIENTATION_LANDSCAPE: Content wider than high (default) ORIENTATION_PORTRAIT: Content heigher than wide.
Return type:int

Return rating of the file content.

Returns:Rating of the file content. Typically a star rating with values from 1 to 5.
Return type:int

class repository.FileIterator[source]¶

Bases: object

Iterator which can be used to traverse through files in a repository.

class repository.Index(dbname='index.sqlite')[source]¶

Bases: object

File meta data index.

Enables quick lookup and filtering of files based on their meta data. Index may span multiple repositories. Files and repositories are referenced via there universal unique identifiers.

Use method build() to build index.

ORDER_DATE_ASC = 1¶
ORDER_DATE_DESC = 2¶
ORDER_NAME_ASC = 3¶
ORDER_NAME_DESC = 4¶
ORDER_RANDOM = 0¶
build(rep, rebuild=False)[source]¶

Build meta data index.

Parameters:
  • rep (repository.Repository) – Repository for which to build the index.
  • rebuild (bool) – Indicates whether index is to be completely rebuilt. Default (False) is to update only, i.e. add the missing entries.
iterator(**criteria)[source]¶

Return selective iterator.

Return selective iterator which allows to traverse through a sub-population of files in the index according to specified criteria.

Parameters:criteria (dict) – Selection criteria
Returns:Selective iterator
Return type:repository.SelectiveIndexIterator
lookup(file, rep)[source]¶

Lookup file meta data.

Parameters:
  • file (repository.Index) – File for which to lookup meta data.
  • rep (repository.Repository) – Repository containing the file.
Returns:

Returns a meta data object for the file if available. Returns None otherwise.
Return type:

repository.MetaData
exception repository.InvalidUuidError(msg, uuid=None)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Invalid universal unique identifier (UUID) error.

class repository.MetaData(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: sqlalchemy.ext.declarative.api.Base

Database model for file meta data.

Database representation of file meta data using SQLAlchemy object relational mapper. Properties resemble properties of class repository.File.

Properties:

id(Integer): Numerical unique identifier. Automatically generated. uuid(String(255)): Universally unique identifier of the file. rep_uuid(String(36)): Universally unique identifier of the repository

containing the file.
type(Integer): Type of the file. See repository.File for acceptable
values.

width(Integer): Width of the file content in pixels. height(Integer): Height of the file content in pixels. rotation(Iteger): Clock-wise rotation of the content in degrees. See

repository.File for acceptable values.
orientation(Integer): Orientation of the content considering rotation.
See repository.File for acceptable values.

creation_date(DateTime): Creation date of the file content. description(String(255)): Description of the file. rating(Integer): Rating of the file content.

class repository.Repository(uuid, index=None)[source]¶

Repository of files.

Abstract base class providing basic functionality common to all Repository subclasses.
